description: Three-candle bearish reversal pattern signaling potential end of uptrend. Consists of large bullish candle, small-bodied candle (star), and large bearish candle that closes well into first candle's body.
validationRules: First candle: Large bullish candle in uptrend
Second candle: Small body (any color) that gaps up
Third candle: Large bearish candle closing below midpoint of first candle
Gap up between first and second candle preferred
Gap down between second and third candle preferred
Third candle should have strong volume
invalidationSignals: Third candle fails to close below first candle's midpoint
commonMistakes: Expecting perfect gaps - they help but aren't mandatory
Ignoring the star candle color - can be bullish or bearish
Not waiting for volume confirmation on third candle
Trading pattern in consolidation instead of uptrend

tradeSetup.entry: Below third candle low or on rally

conflicting: Uptrend still strong on higher timeframe
